content:
/>
X.i.4.C.3.g
.
When Development Establishes Factual Basis for Award Suspension
If the developed evidence establishes a factual basis for suspension of the award, then
in cases subject to forfeiture, follow the due process procedures in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 3.B.2
, or
in all other cases, follow the due process procedures in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 3.A
and
B
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
